Package ui.controller

Class ViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.controller.ViewController
  • public class ViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages multiple views using a CardLayout to allow switching between different panels. This controller helps manage UI navigation by storing different views and displaying them dynamically.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ViewController​(javax.swing.JPanel pageManager)
      Constructs a ViewController with a given parent container.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.awt.CardLayout getCardLayout()
      Retrieves the CardLayout instance used to manage view switching.
      java.lang.String getCurrentViewName()
      Returns the name of the currently displayed card.
      javax.swing.JPanel getCurrentViewPanel()
      Returns the JPanel of the currently visible card.
      javax.swing.JPanel getViewControllerPanel()
      Retrieves the main panel that contains all the views managed by this ViewController.
      void removeViewPanelByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Removes a card from the CardLayout.
      void showView​(java.lang.String name)
      Shows the desired page (card) in the parent container.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewController

        public ViewController​(javax.swing.JPanel pageManager)
        Constructs a ViewController with a given parent container.
        Parameters:
        pageManager - The JPanel that serves as the parent container for all views.

    • Method Detail

      • showView

        public void showView​(java.lang.String name)
        Shows the desired page (card) in the parent container. If the specified page is not found, it does nothing.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the card/page to be displayed.

      • getCardLayout

        public java.awt.CardLayout getCardLayout()
        Retrieves the CardLayout instance used to manage view switching.
        Returns:
        The CardLayout instance used by this ViewController.

      • getViewControllerPanel

        public javax.swing.JPanel getViewControllerPanel()
        Retrieves the main panel that contains all the views managed by this ViewController.
        Returns:
        The JPanel that serves as the parent container for all views managed by this ViewController.

      • getCurrentViewName

        public java.lang.String getCurrentViewName()
        Returns the name of the currently displayed card.
        Returns:
        The name of the currently visible card, or null if not found.

      • getCurrentViewPanel

        public javax.swing.JPanel getCurrentViewPanel()
        Returns the JPanel of the currently visible card.
        Returns:
        The currently visible JPanel, or null if not found.

      • removeViewPanelByName

        public void removeViewPanelByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a card from the CardLayout.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the card to remove.
